remarks: Lemma for ~ qtopcmp and ~ qtopcon .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Mar-2015.)
statement:
qtopcmp.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
qtopcmplem.1 $e |- ( J e. A -> J e. Top ) $.
qtopcmplem.2 $e |- ( ( J e. A /\ F : X -onto-> U. ( J qTop F ) /\ F e. ( J Cn ( J qTop F ) ) ) -> ( J qTop F ) e. A ) $.
